item.title: Flooded underpass on lower road, 18th November
item.description:
There is an underpass leading from one side of lower road to the other, this has flooded and so public can use this. This is resulting in people crossing the road in areas they shouldn't be and could cause a serious accident. Please can someone attend as soon as possible,
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Road, Lower Belvedere, Erith, London Borough of Bexley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose tactile paving stone outside 20 Tottenham St, London W1T 4RG, 18th November
item.description:
A tactile paving stone has come loose, which presents an unexpected and easy to miss trip hazard. It rocks up and down, so it can appear deceptively normal, only for it to pop up and catch your foot as you walk over it. A member of the public has already suffered a painful fall in this location because they were not aware of the loose stone. The tactile pavement must to be repaired as soon as possible before another entirely preventable accident occurs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Tottenham Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Tree looks dead, potentially dangerous, 18th November
item.description:
Tree has already recently shed a limb onto pavement. Please inspect tree - on boundary of Woodhayes flats in Willow Grove. I believe it is dead or dying and in danger of falling onto the pavement and road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London Borough of Bromley

item.title: Regular Fly tipping, 18th November
item.description:
Regular dumping of furniture and large waste at this location. There is always rubbish here, dumped by the same household. This has been happening for a long time and the council seems unable to address it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Park Road, Bermondsey, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: New river stinks, 18th November
item.description:
Over the past few weeks the river opposite the cafe in clissold has began to smell insanely pungent. Smells as though a sewage pipe has broken or something has died. The smell seems to get worse everyday. Should be checked out asap
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alleyway has become a tip, 18th November

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
